_comments: import all images, matching their titles with the same card data over and over = (above) importOptions/importByImage: true
add a new card = add:true, newValues {}
get card directly from Gatherer = where: gatherer='Serra Angel'
ignore later image match and use the one from data (or override below) = useCardDataImg = true

exceptions._comment: delete all cards that weren't selected above
Have to set to legendary after deleting otherwise everything legendary won't be deleted even if it's too low of a number
